title.rendered: Children from Mission Education centre watch movie with Parineeti Chopra

content.rendered:
All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy and that is why Children from a Mission Education centre were taken out of the classrooms and had a fun filled day with actress Parineeti Chopra on the 1st of November 2017. Parineeti’s latest movie Golmaal Again was screened for the kids. The movie is a comedy and the kids had a gala time watching the movie.

Smile Foundation is an NGO in India directly benefitting over 400,000 children and their families every year, through more than 200 live welfare projects on education, healthcare, livelihood and women empowerment, in over 950 remote villages and slums across 25 states of India.
